Class Theater

  • java.lang.Object
    • Theater

  • public class Theater
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Theater()
      Constructor initializes seating sections and movies that the theater is showing creates a new reservation information file if one does not already exist.
